price: 4. Hadduu doono Alle inuu yeesho wiil (siday leeyihiin gaalada) wuxuu ka dooran lahaa wuxuu abuuray wuxuu doono. Xurmo oo dhan Isagaa leh oo ka hufan (xumaan). Waa Allaah, Waaxidka Keliga ah, Sandulleeyaha (daalimiinta iyo isla weynayaasha).
arabic: لَّوۡ أَرَادَ ٱللَّهُ أَن يَتَّخِذَ وَلَدٗا لَّٱصۡطَفَىٰ مِمَّا يَخۡلُقُ مَا يَشَآءُۚ سُبۡحَٰنَهُۥۖ هُوَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡوَٰحِدُ ٱلۡقَهَّارُ

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: law arāda al-lahu an yattakhidha waladan la-iṣ'ṭafā mimmā yakhluqu mā yashāu sub'ḥānahu huwa al-lahu al-wāḥidu al-qahāru
